"About this Quest":
"Before you start this quest, you can select a combination of equipment and skills from the Class Set Terminal.

In this quest, defeated enemies will not drop items. You can only obtain items from breaking containers."

"The following types of Class Sets are available:
① Attack:
A Set that's good at dealing high amounts of damage to enemies.
② Rush:
A Set that can use a double-jump to get to high places. Has access to Complex PAs.
③ Support:
A Set that can use recovery and support Techniques to assist your allies. Has access to Compound Techniques.
④ Unique:
A Successor class. Starting level is lower than other Sets, but has powerful PAs and class skills."
"In this quest, your VR energy will only decrease when you are defeated. It will not decrease over time."
